B

backButton - Variable in class frame.GamePanel
The images for the two states of the buttons for exiting the game to main menu.
backgrounds - Variable in class frame.GamePanel
All the backgrounds used throughout the game.
battleButton - Variable in class frame.GamePanel
The images for the two states of the buttons available in combat.
battleTimer - Variable in class frame.GamePanel
Restricts the length of the battle.
Button(String, Point, Image[]) - Constructor for class frame.GamePanel.Button
Constructs a Button with all required fields.
button - Variable in class frame.GamePanel.Button
An array consisting of the two images that represent the button.
buttonAnalysis(Point) - Method in class frame.GamePanel.Button
This checks if the button was pressed by comparing it to the last click location.
buttonAnalysis(Point) - Method in class frame.GamePanel.MuteButton
 
buttonClicked() - Method in class frame.GamePanel.Button
 
buttons - Variable in class frame.GamePanel
A 2D array of all the buttons.
